    • ProgramAction_GetWord

      public static java.lang.String ProgramAction_GetWord​(int intNumberOfWords, int intWordMaximum, int intWordMinimum, int intMaxWordsFromDictionary)
      Abstract: Prints the word that is retrieved from the dictionary, and returns the word
      Parameters:
      intNumberOfWords - The amount of words the user would like to see in one call and, on one line.
      intWordMaximum - The maximum amount of chars the user wants possible in each word found
      intWordMinimum - The minimum amount of chars the user wants possible in each word found
      intMaxWordsFromDictionary - The maximum or limit desired of words to read from dictionary text file
      Returns:
      strWordRetrieved The word that is randomly pulled from the dictionary
      Since:
      02/17/2022

    • WriteWordToFile

      public static java.lang.Boolean WriteWordToFile​(java.lang.String strWordToWrite, java.lang.String strFilename_Full, java.lang.Boolean blnAddToExisting)
      Abstract: Writes words to a text file
      Parameters:
      strWordToWrite - Word to write to the text file
      strFilename_Full - Full path name, including file name, for the text file
      blnAddToExisting - Indicates if writer should add word to existing words, or overwrite existing file
      Returns:
      blnWriteSuccess Indicates whether or not the word was successfully written to the file
      Since:
      02/20/2022

    • DoWordsExistWithLengthRange

      public static boolean DoWordsExistWithLengthRange​(int intWordMinimum, int intWordMaximum, int intMaxWordsFromDictionary)
      Abstract: Writes words to a text file
      Parameters:
      intWordMaximum - The maximum amount of chars the user wants possible in each word found
      intWordMinimum - The minimum amount of chars the user wants possible in each word found
      intMaxWordsFromDictionary - The maximum or limit desired of words to read from dictionary text file
      Returns:
      blnWordsExistInLengthRange Indicates whether or not a word exists in given length range
